name: LightUp!
description:
This game is made for TriJam#123. The goal is to stay out of the light in every level. Please report any bugs/ accessibility issues in the comments i'll try to fix them all the best I can.

Controls:

WASD, Arrow Keys, or Controller DPAD or Controller Left Stick

Tip: The game only starts counting down on each level after you've made an input, so feel free to take as long as you wish to read the text!
